SpeechNode.text: Yes, I am. I have lived in the Forest since I was a spec of dust. Our Creator breathed life into every single one of us and made us who we are. Only a select few can actually become a Fairy.
SpeechNode.name: Fern2

SpeechNode.text: How do you not know of the Creator of the Fairies? She exists all around us- where you stand even!
SpeechNode.name: Fern3

SpeechNode.text: Yes, The Forest is responsible for everything. You cannot understand the power that flows from the trees. When they die, they decompose. The soil becomes littered with the remnants of past life. Everything you eat, everything that grows, everything you touch- all made possible because of the death of others.
SpeechNode.name: Fern4

SpeechNode.text: I do not fear death. I respect it.
SpeechNode.name: Fern5

SpeechNode.text: When you die, others can exist. These series of events are needed for new Life. Where do you think you came from? Your life force was created from the recycling of countless deaths. Aren't you greatful to be alive? You can thank them for giving you a chance to be alive. We all get a chance to be alive. It is the right of all life.
SpeechNode.name: Fern6

Option.text: I think I'm beginning to understand.
